title: New: Manou – Loving You
content:
Sixteen year old Manou found online success with her debut track, Sadie, a real early 00’s throwback.

Her much anticipated follow-up, Loving You, is perhaps not as immediate in nature but is equally as exciting, showing yet again that she knows how to find a killer chorus. Working alongside PNUT (Amy Winehouse, Foxes, Sparks) on her debut album, you can bet that she’s got a host of hits up her sleeve.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
